meanings.definition: Superlative form of velvet, having the most velvet-like qualities.
meanings.sent1: The velvetiest pillow felt incredibly soft against my cheek.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was the velvetiest thing I had ever touched.
meanings.sent3: The cat insisted on sitting on the velvetiest chair in the house.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in the velvetiest hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The velvetiest petals of the rose glistened with morning dew.

meanings.definition: Used to describe something as the most velvety in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The velvetiest fabric draped elegantly over the furniture.
meanings.sent2: The dessert was the velvetiest treat I had ever tasted.
meanings.sent3: She proudly displayed the velvetiest painting in her art collection.
meanings.sent4: The actor's voice was the velvetiest, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The velvetiest touch of the breeze carried the scent of flowers.
